SPECIAL EDUCATION/GEOGRAPHY  
  
 FCS-OYO    
FC-ZARIA  
MINNA  
  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Geography and two (2) other Science 
subjects.  
  
Geography and any two (2)  of Science subjects.  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY  
  
FCS-OYO  
MINNA   
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Chemistry and two (2) other Science 
subjects.  
  
Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics, 
General Science/Biology.  
  
CULTURAL AND CREATIVE ART / CHRISTIAN  
RELIGIOUS STUDIES  
  
MOCPED  
OTTO/IJANIKIN  
    
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Fine Arts 
and one (1)   Arts subject  
  
Christian Religious Studies and two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
  
CULTURAL AND CREATIVE ART/ISLAMIC  
STUDIES  
OTTO/IJANIKIN  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language,  
Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Fine Arts and one (1)  
Arts subject  
  
Islamic Studies and two (2) Arts subjects.  
  
  
CULTURAL AND CREATIVE ART / SOCIAL  
STUDIES  
    
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government/History, Fine Arts/Music 
and one (1)  Social Science/Arts subject.  
  
Government/History and one (1)  Arts, one (1)  Social 
Science subject.
